item.title: How I cracked my MLE interview at Facebook
item.description: It was August last year and I was in the process of giving interviews. By that point in time, I was already interviewing for Google India and Amazon India for Machine Learning and Data Science roles respectively. And then my senior advised me to apply for a role in Facebook London.

item.title: 5 tips for getting your first Data Science job in 2020
